colla.kernel.api

Interface CollAUser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    User

    public interface CollAUser
    CollAUser is a client who can create groups, join groups, chat, register hosts, submit tasks and start jobs available on CollA.
    Author:
    Diogo Matos

        Compares two users
        Parameters:
        user - an user to be compared to one that invokes the method.
        Returns:
        0 if users are equal, any value different of 0 if not.

      • getGroups

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,CollAGroup> getGroups()
        Returns:
        groups to which user belongs in a map in which the group names are the keys.

      • getHosts

        java.util.Set<CollAHost> getHosts()
        Returns:
        a set containing all hosts owned by the user.

      • getHost

        CollAHost getHost(java.lang.String HostName)
        Parameters:
        HostName - name of the host
        Returns:
        a CollAHost owned by this user with the given name. Returns null if there is none.

        Returns:
        if the machine has a public IP accessible over the Internet.

      • invalidateIP

        void invalidateIP()
        Sets that the machine doesn't have a public IP accessible over the Internet. and may be behind a NAT

      • isOnline

        boolean isOnline()
        Returns:
        true if user is connected to the server, false otherwise

      • recordActivities

        void recordActivities(java.lang.String date,
                    java.lang.String activity)
        Stores user activities performed on the server in a map.
        Parameters:
        date - Date when activity was performed. Dates are the key to retrieve the activities.
        activity - A text describing the activity.

      • setActivities

        void setActivities(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        Parameters:
        map - A map of user activities on the server which has dates as keys.
